text: Demirören Holding is a Turkish holding company headquartered in Istanbul. Demirören Holding assets include the Milliyet and Vatan newspapers, Milangaz (a liquefied petroleum gas distributor with 9% of the Turkish market) and several shopping mall in Beyoğlu.Dogan News Agency, 4 May 2011, Milliyet and Vatan papers sold to DK ==References== Category:Istanbul Category:Holding companies of Turkey
title: Demirören Group
